createNewUser

public boolean createNewUser(java.lang.String author,
                             java.lang.String login,
                             java.lang.String desc,
                             java.lang.String password,
                             boolean isAdministrator)
Create a new suer from the given data.

Parameters:
author, - the author name for the user.
login, - the login name for the user.
desc, - the description of the user.
password, - the password for the user.
isAdministrator, - true if the user is an administrator, else false.
Returns:
boolean, true if the new user was successfully created, else false.
